participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys quiet activities, and values personal image.
participant_1.background: My weight is normal. I have woman calling me all the time. I enjoy playing recreational games like cards, darts or billiards. I worry about my image. I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Resourceful and nurturing, able to connect ideas and deeply cares for family.
participant_2.background: I have a knack for making connections between seemingly unrelated things. I've been in a relationship for 5 years, but I feel like I don't measure up to my partner's standards. I have two sons that I am raising by myself. I am relocating my troops to a new location. My favorite hobby is gardening.

content.text: Good! I am just hanging out.
Nice! I am just doing some gardening.
Me too! It is a nice hobby.
I always feel like I am not very good at it.
Do not worry! Everyone has to start somewhere.
Thanks! I think I need to get some new plants.
That is always a good idea! I love to go to the nursery and look at all the plants.
Me too! I love seeing all the different types of plants.
I have been keeping a lot of plants inside lately.
I have been relocating my troops to a new location, so I have not had much time to go outside and garden.
Oh that is a bummer! I am sure your plants will be okay.
